metadata.description: Amu's beloved Guardians Characters finally nab the spotlight in this new Shugo Chara series! Ran, Miki, and Su explore holidays, exercise, bears, cooking, painting, and more character changes than you can count in these hilarious and lighthearted short stories, told in 4-koma (4-panel) comic-strip format.
metadata.name: Shugo Chara Chan!
